```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lterdatasampler)
library(here)

```

```{r}
crab_stats <- pie_crab %>% group_by(latitude, site) %>% 
  summarise(
  n = n(), 
  mean_mm = mean(size),
  min_mm = min(size),
  max_mm = max(size),
  sd_mm = sd(size),
  median_mm = median(size)
  ) 
```
